post.author: khambley
post.title: Creating a Minecraft "Mod" with the Java language
post.description: Yep, I'm creating my very own Minecraft Mod and I'm learning the Java language with Eclipse IDE at t
post.content: Yep, I'm creating my very own Minecraft Mod and I'm learning the Java language with Eclipse IDE at the same time. I've always wanted to learn Java, at least the basics and I thought this would be a perfect way to do that. I found an online course, mainly geared towards kids but adults can sign up too. It's called Youth Digital. Here is the link: www.youthdigital.com. I'm taking Mod Design 1. It's pretty fun! I love Minecraft! I think all this online learning is great, it's really come a long way since I was in school. ;)
